entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
